messages.content: How do I charge my Tesla at home?

Claudia, your Tesla assistant 😊

You can charge your Tesla at home by installing a home charger, which allows you to conveniently charge your vehicle overnight. ⚡🏠🚗 It's a great way to ensure your car is ready to go each morning! 😊💡
Sorry, but I didn't fully understand your question. Could you please provide more details or rephrase the question so I can better assist you?
